website_summaries.verdict: The Soundfreaq Sound Step offers everything you'd want in an all-in-one speaker dock, except great sound.
pros: The Soundfreaq Sound Step throws in a little bit of everything with its low-profile, modern look, wireless Bluetooth audio, video out, USB charge port, remote control, FM radio, and compatibility with Apple's iPad, iPhone, and iPod
cons: Sound is thin and lifeless, and the FM radio tuner requires an app interface to operate

customer_reviews.title: You can't get much for for $20.00 these days
customer_reviews.text: I took a chance on this Soundfreaq, though a refurbished product it airrved in good shape and have to say for it's size "13 inches across this has really good full sound to it.The remote control functioned properly and the unit is solidly built. Took minutes to set up, I use it for my TV and a movie sounded really good. Also, my Ipod touch in docking station sounded good, now I don't have to mess with the Ipod. I think I'm going to order another one.
customer_reviews.author: Kinyo

customer_reviews.title: This thing sounds way better than ANYTHING Bose (which is highly over rated and ...
customer_reviews.text: This thing sounds way better than ANYTHING Bose (which is highly over rated and over priced,no lows must be Bose). The Freaq as I call in, immerses you in sound, clarity, and sonic bliss! I would indeed recommend this to anyone who listens critically to music. Deep bass, clear pronounced highs with a surround effect. I got mine for $50.00 but would have paid more. Love it, red color is cool also!
customer_reviews.author: Microwave

customer_reviews.title: Daughter loves it
customer_reviews.text: This turned out to be a good pick. It is surprisingly loud, has commendable sound quality, the construction is very nice, is aesthetically cool, and very functional. The only downside is the docking of an Android device, you can't. I haven't seen a good docking system for Android yet. However, you simply plug it in with the cord and lay or prop it up. Bluetooth streaming is very cool and cordless speaker is a hit. She even brings it in the bathroom when she takes a shower! No regrets here.
customer_reviews.author: Trindaddy

customer_reviews.title: Recharged
customer_reviews.text: I bought this speaker mainly for it's rechargeable battery and I love it. I have an older home that suffers from a lack of outside power outlets. Now I can relax on my deck with the tunes flowing. I wouldn't say this has the same great sound quality of my indoor surround sound system but I wasn't expecting it to. But it does have good sound quality for sitting on the deck enjoying a cold beverage and a tasty steak with friends. The blue tooth feature works perfectly with both my ipod touch and my Samsung Galaxy Epic phone. Definately worth every penny I paid for it and shipping was fast as well. I highly recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: coolmeld

customer_reviews.title: Favorite Gadget So Far! Great Sound!
customer_reviews.text: Took my new speaker to the river, I even put it inside of a plastic bag to protect it it from the dust and water. The Bluetooth feature is fantastic, I was able to place my iPhone in an Aqua Pack and stream my music but the best part is the sound, very impressive, I was able to hear it's full clear sound even with speed boats flying by. I had a very pleasant surprise when I found that the remote cleverly snaps into the bottom for convenient access and storage. My favorite gadget so far in 2012.
customer_reviews.author: L

customer_reviews.title: Best sound for the money - functional too!
customer_reviews.text: I bought one of these in a store several years ago for $100 for our office - its easy for anyone to sync their phone up to, and it has a USB plug for charging, so the antiquated 30-pin dock is not a concern. Bought this one for our new warehouse, and the sound is just unbelievable! Nice, round sound even at high volume (if environment acoustics are good). Worth every penny!
customer_reviews.author: ArtflK9

customer_reviews.title: Would definitely recommend.
customer_reviews.text: I love this speaker. I've gotten numerous compliments on it. I love that it can either be plugged into the wall or used wirelessly. I think the battery lasted me about 8 hrs of continuous play? Not 100% sure, but around there. It's a great size and fairly portable. Would definitely recommend.
customer_reviews.author: M.Schae

customer_reviews.title: Lots of features
customer_reviews.text: I researched quite a few of these Bluetooth speakers and chose this one because of the list of features. The brand name wasn't as familiar as some of the other units I was considering but the feature set was just what I wanted. It is not a powerful unit but if you want a unit that fills the room this is it. It links seamlessly with my smartphone, the battery life is very good and the price is very competitive. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: carve

customer_reviews.title: Bump for you buck!
customer_reviews.text: Won't find a better unit for the price. Very pleased with purchase. I also have the SFQ 1, which has a better bass response, but this unit still sounds great, is smaller, portable, and well worth the $30.00 price I paid. Sound quality is excellent for all styles of music.
customer_reviews.author: R. Snow

customer_reviews.title: Soundfreaq SFQ002RB
customer_reviews.text: Sound quality is excellent for its size and very portable. Nice to be able to use either Bluetooth connection or to dock an Iphone or Ipad and ability to receive FM stations. Down sides are kind of poor battery life but not too bad and source can't be very far from or obstructed when using Bluetooth connection. Overall, great product at a decent price!
customer_reviews.author: bobmar

customer_reviews.title: Great Sound and versatility
customer_reviews.text: The Soundfreaq Step Recharge has amazing sound for it's size. I was looking for a smaller dock for the kitchen. Not only is it useful there, but with it's battery it's highly portable around the house. The Bluetooth feature is great - I can stream shows to my iPad, but have the sound come through the speaker several feet away. Overall a great purchase, good value, easy to use, quality product. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: TheCritic

customer_reviews.title: AWESOME!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Got this as a gift for my daughter. Me and my granddaughter went halfs on it. We cant wait to give it to her. We tried it out and the sound is amazing!! We could have gotten a cheaper one but we wanted quality. The red color is just beautiful. You wont go wrong with this one. Shipping was fast...
customer_reviews.author: Dsma

customer_reviews.title: ... have the ability to turn off power saving mode like the sfq-07 does
customer_reviews.text: Doesnt have the ability to turn off power saving mode like the sfq-07 does. So i cant use it with my chromecast audio without physically turning it on. Sound quality is amazing though!
customer_reviews.author: McAllister

customer_reviews.title: Great iPad 2 dock
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my wife not too long ago and we've already used it a ton! Bluetooth works flawlessly as does the app on iPad 2 and Android. Very happy with this so far. Granted, we haven't had it long so certain features haven't been used yet, but so far so good. Remote works well and the Bluetooth has easily connected to any device I've thrown at it. I'm pretty picky about the way my tunes sound and I'm very happy with the sound from this small package. Happy with this purchase and so is my wife, which is what matters most.
customer_reviews.author: 86runner

customer_reviews.title: Work needed
customer_reviews.text: Sound is pretty good and the unit is very solid, just as promised. Need to contact the dealer/manufacturer about a slight issue which will raise this to 5 stars, will update when possible. Thank you. Neil
customer_reviews.author: Neil Fujiwara

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Customer Support
customer_reviews.text: I recieved my product and was excited to use it. I did as said on the instruction card and charge the unit over night for the first time use. I pair up my device and injoyed the sound. There was only one problem, the device lasted only 30 min on a full charge. I contacted the company because I wanted to make sure that there was something potentially wrong with the device or thats just how long it stays charged. They sent me a brand new one, which got there in a couple of days, and had me sent the defective one back. The new one works great. I would/have recommended this product to other people.
customer_reviews.author: Will

customer_reviews.title: I found what i need, not what others want me to get!
customer_reviews.text: I looked for couple months some speakers that have all i want, there were some that offer just some features but i was sure there was someone that could offer me everything i want on my speakers and i found Soundfreaq! It still work great, battery life is really good, good sound!
customer_reviews.author: JAPV

customer_reviews.title: Big boom for the buck
customer_reviews.text: Awesome deal! Didn't think I would get so much for so little. Great and loud sound compared to size. Although it uses the old iPod/iPhone connection it still has Bluetooth and AUX so playing other devices is no problem. If you are looking for an affordable portable speaker, this is it.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas Guerra

customer_reviews.title: Great Look, Poor Sound
customer_reviews.text: Love the look of this system, I bought the red, and the bluetooth connectivity is great. What's not so great is the sound, which is kind of the whole point. The bass isn't that deep, and like another reviewer put it, it sounds like music coming out of a can. Not happy about dishing out the bucks for this one.
customer_reviews.author: Tripthelight

customer_reviews.title: Amazing
customer_reviews.text: I received the black SFQ02RB as a Christmas gift and can't imagine the day-to-day without it. I stream off my iPhone/MacBook all day and keep my work BBerry/Bluetooth charging throughout. It sounds great indoors/outdoors and I get compliments on it all the time. I just got my girl the Ghost (white) version for her birthday and my brother in NYC got one as well. Go get one now! Worth every cent. Dan Boston
customer_reviews.author: Dan L.

customer_reviews.title: Best product ever
customer_reviews.text: This is the best sound system I have ever heard, better than BOSE. Very Loud and clear.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Easy install.
customer_reviews.text: System sounds and works great. The only complaint I have is not enough bass. Easy to hook up. I used fiber optic cable.
customer_reviews.author: James T. Logan

customer_reviews.title: Good Unit; so pleased I bought 2.
customer_reviews.text: Excellent sound quality. Good dynamic range. Blutooth connectivity excellent once you figure it out.
customer_reviews.author: EastCoastAl

customer_reviews.title: Very Nice quality
customer_reviews.text: I love it and it seems to be nice quality. I have had it almost a year and it works great with Bluetooth and the App works great also. Has a nice amount of bass and sounds very good for such a small size radio
customer_reviews.author: Creative Spectrum

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic for it's size
customer_reviews.text: Not only was the sound excellent for it's size, for the price it's the best deal out there. All the functions areuser friendly and the app makes your phone a really nice remote. I live in a rural area so the radio signals are weak and limited but the radio channels on my phone make up for it. The battery life is good, I can't think of anything really negative. It even make a nice sound system for my TV!
customer_reviews.author: BRUCE FAVALORO

customer_reviews.title: iPod Sound dock
customer_reviews.text: This is good quality for the money. I still think the the Bose sound dock is superior but this was $100 cheaper so I went for it.
customer_reviews.author: gcmckay

customer_reviews.title: tough!!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I buy the sound freak because it has good reviews, all you already read!!. But after 2 years in use at least 4 days a week and being exposed to my work environment. Wish is construction, I have to write a review worthy of this product!!!!!!!!. After being expose to my work environment. ... sawdust, sheetrock, soquete, paint, and multiple drops. I have to say "IT'S TOUGH" although it has many scratches and 3 broken corners I find it worth the money!!!!!. The battery charge still last 3 hours! !! Out loud "!!!
customer_reviews.author: netoga

customer_reviews.title: Good quality sound at an affordable price.
customer_reviews.text: Great sound, decent BT distance. Perfect to get my morning energy up!
customer_reviews.author: Abe C

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: The battery wore out in less than a year with no way to replace it.
customer_reviews.author: State Street

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Quality
customer_reviews.text: Awesome product! Sounds great, love the bluetooth! Also a great plus is the ability to dock an ipad, connect to your tv, and stream movies from youtube or netflix! A great investment, considering how fast technology changes, and if the iphone 5 rumors are correct about the connection being smaller, then bluetooth is the way to go!
customer_reviews.author: Emily

customer_reviews.title: This does it all and sounds good!
customer_reviews.text: When you look at all this speaker dock can do I can't believe the price. The Bluetooth works great. It charges my iPad and my EVO G4 at the same time. The remote app works well. I think the best feature is the battery back up, I can take it any where I want and have great sound! I think is sounds great, yes it does not sound as good as some $300 buck units (Bose) that just do Bluetooth.
customer_reviews.author: Tony

customer_reviews.title: Best rechargeable bluetooth dock on the market
customer_reviews.text: I liked this product from the moment i saw it in the local target. Its not a bad piece of technology for the money and it can register your bluetooth device from a good twenty feet flawlessly. Its a great dock and the fact that its as portable as it is is even better. Only thing i wish was better is its range in the high pitched noises. But overall, nice product for the money.
customer_reviews.author: FTuck12

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: fast and product was great. 2nd speaker I bought. Great sound
customer_reviews.author: pat

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: This is definitely one of my favorite things that I own. I got it last summer for my birthday. I love it. Nuff said.
customer_reviews.author: Skyler A. Loth

customer_reviews.title: Excellent choice
customer_reviews.text: I got surprised by the sound and the application for remote control for iPad. The pairing was very easy to do and the battery duration is good (more than I was expecting) If you are looking for a good speaker with battery for pairing using blutooth, this is a good choice
customer_reviews.author: Gerardo Santiago

customer_reviews.title: Love the Soundfreaq
customer_reviews.text: Does everything I expected it to do. Sound is great, blue tooth reception is outstanding. The rechargeable battery allows it to go anywhere without dragging cords everywhere. The storage space underneath for the remote keeps it safe and hidden when not in use. The remote app for iPhone and iPad is also excellent.
customer_reviews.author: Robert Rhinehart

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I would recommend this to everyone. The sound is great, and the price is even better.
customer_reviews.author: LishT

customer_reviews.title: big letdown
customer_reviews.text: I bought this based on all the positive reviews. Frankly, it was a big letdown. Sound quality was poor, especially streaming Pandora over bluetooth. The $40 Oontz Angle bluetooth speaker is much better and much cheaper (not to mention smaller). The remote was useless, as was the iOS companion app.
customer_reviews.author: thekingb

customer_reviews.title: Good sound, small package
customer_reviews.text: I like this unit. Lots of features, quality construction, good sound. Remote works well. Looks classy in white. I would recommend it. Only drawback is that it does not fit the new iPod connection standard - the small pin connector.
customer_reviews.author: Tim Blair

customer_reviews.title: Good sound great value
customer_reviews.text: We wanted to get the new Bose device but it is ridiculously priced so searched for a better option. This has everything the Bose has for a reasonable price and equally good sound. The bass isn't the best but it's not terrible (buy the bigger unit for deeper sound). Recommended!
customer_reviews.author: Ari Lazarus

customer_reviews.title: Works pretty well but doesn't charge your phone
customer_reviews.text: Sound quality is decent but I'm no audiophile. It bugs my husband who is an audiophile who scoffs at such a ow end solution. I was expecting it to recharge my phone but didn't.
customer_reviews.author: S Waugh

customer_reviews.title: Great Soundfreq
customer_reviews.text: Does everything that is stated in the specification... Actually louder and clearer than I expected. No signs of distortion at very loud levels.. Very happy...
customer_reviews.author: Dilligaf

customer_reviews.title: Nice unit
customer_reviews.text: Sounds good, Bluetooth works well, very handy. Wish it was a little more "outdoorsy" for camping. I use it as a charging dock for my iPad all the time.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: great
customer_reviews.text: I used it this weekend camping and a few of my friends are now ordering one... I also usedit in the house
customer_reviews.author: DESIREE

customer_reviews.title: SoundFreaq is good for a small space.
customer_reviews.text: I would buy this MP3 speaker system again. It is easy and the sound is clear in a small space. Just what I was looking for.
customer_reviews.author: Michele Wilkinson

customer_reviews.title: Works Well- Sounds could be better
customer_reviews.text: The speaker connects quickly and works good. The only issue is the sound, it sounds like it is muffled and it is not crystal clear Buy a different product.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel A. Lindenbaum

customer_reviews.title: Not so hot
customer_reviews.text: Sound was decent, but a couple of things made this a less than stellar product: 1. Its inability to smoothly transition from docked to undocked. It stopped whatever was playing on the device, so I had to restart the stream. 2. Battery life as described: "Battery Power Rechargeable Lithium battery with 6hr+ battery life." Battery life in reality: about 20 minutes. Sent it back.
customer_reviews.author: D. Dunn

customer_reviews.title: Not for newer Apple products
customer_reviews.text: Read product description carefully. The technology is designed to dock iPad 2 and iPhone 4. My fault for not being more careful about that. However the Bluetooth quit working after only a week. Am going to try to return it.
customer_reviews.author: Linda

customer_reviews.title: Good features, very disappointing sound quality
customer_reviews.text: The feature set is awesome, and it works well as far as that goes, but both my wife and I immediately noticed the poor sound quality. It is very "tinny" and has a very weak bass response. Even our old Philips DC310 [...] clock/ipod dock sounds better. We are not audiophiles and frankly I am not usually very picky about my speakers, but the sound quality on this thing is actually distractingly poor to the point where it is irritating to have it on. It's going back.
customer_reviews.author: William F. Cook

product_meta.title: SoundFreaq SFQ-02 Sound Step Bluetooth Speaker System w/Dock for 30-pin Apple iPad/iPod/iPhone + 3.5mm Aux Jack and USB Charging Port – Black
product_meta.description: Color:Black| Product Packaging:Standard PackagingYou use your mobile devices (iPad, iPhone, etc.) for just about everything: to make calls, write emails, browse the web, listen to music, watch movies, play games, and use countless apps. But it is hard to multi-task with home audio systems that still require docking. With built-in Bluetooth capability, you can stream audio directly to the Soundfreaq Sound Step without missing a beat; letting you keep your device exactly where you want it, in your hand. Sound Step is designed to bring anywhere with a rechargeable battery and low profile. Sound Platform is acoustically balanced to compliment every genre, at any volume.
feature_bullets: High Fidelity Sound Signature sound profile crafted for natural bass response and vocal clarity.
Battery Power Rechargeable Lithium battery with 6hr+ battery life.
Composite Video Out Display video from iPad, iPhone or iPod device on external TV or monitor display.
Bluetooth Wireless Pair & Play to wirelessly stream audio from any compatible A2DP Bluetooth device.
Free remote control app available for iPhone and iPad.

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.1 out of 5 stars112 ratings4.1 out of 5 stars
specifications.Best Sellers Rank: #9,295 in Portable Bluetooth Speakers#67,404 in MP3 & MP4 Player Accessories
